title: 关于启动语句的问题。。。。。。。。
author: alan08
txt_content:
本帖最后由 alan08 于 2014-7-5 08:45 编辑 

好不容易用自编的java程序生成了MC启动代码：
java -Xmx2048M -Djava.library.path="F:\myLauncher\Launcher\.minecraft\versions\natives" -cp "F:\myLauncher\Launcher\.minecraft\libraries\net\sf\jopt-simple\jopt-simple\4.5\jopt-simple-4.5.jar;F:\myLauncher\Launcher\.minecraft\libraries\com\paulscode\codecjorbis\20101023\codecjorbis-20101023.jar;F:\myLauncher\Launcher\.minecraft\libraries\com\paulscode\codecwav\20101023\codecwav-20101023.jar;F:\myLauncher\Launcher\.minecraft\libraries\com\paulscode\libraryjavasound\20101123\libraryjavasound-20101123.jar;F:\myLauncher\Launcher\.minecraft\libraries\com\paulscode\librarylwjglopenal\20100824\librarylwjglopenal-20100824.jar;F:\myLauncher\Launcher\.minecraft\libraries\com\paulscode\soundsystem\20120107\soundsystem-20120107.jar;F:\myLauncher\Launcher\.minecraft\libraries\argo\argo\2.25_fixed\argo-2.25_fixed.jar;F:\myLauncher\Launcher\.minecraft\libraries\org\bouncycastle\bcprov-jdk15on\1.47\bcprov-jdk15on-1.47.jar;F:\myLauncher\Launcher\.minecraft\libraries\com\google\guava\guava\14.0\guava-14.0.jar;F:\myLauncher\Launcher\.minecraft\libraries\org\apache\commons\commons-lang3\3.1\commons-lang3-3.1.jar;F:\myLauncher\Launcher\.minecraft\libraries\commons-io\commons-io\2.4\commons-io-2.4.jar;F:\myLauncher\Launcher\.minecraft\libraries\net\java\jinput\jinput\2.0.5\jinput-2.0.5.jar;F:\myLauncher\Launcher\.minecraft\libraries\net\java\jutils\jutils\1.0.0\jutils-1.0.0.jar;F:\myLauncher\Launcher\.minecraft\libraries\com\google\code\gson\gson\2.2.2\gson-2.2.2.jar;F:\myLauncher\Launcher\.minecraft\libraries\org\lwjgl\lwjgl\lwjgl\2.9.0\lwjgl-2.9.0.jar;F:\myLauncher\Launcher\.minecraft\libraries\org\lwjgl\lwjgl\lwjgl_util\2.9.0\lwjgl_util-2.9.0.jar;F:\myLauncher\Launcher\.minecraft\libraries\org\lwjgl\lwjgl\lwjgl-platform\2.9.0\lwjgl-platform-2.9.0-natives-windows.jar;F:\myLauncher\Launcher\.minecraft\libraries\net\java\jinput\jinput-platform\2.0.5\jinput-platform-2.0.5-natives-windows.jar;F:\myLauncher\Launcher\.minecraft\versions\1.6.4\1.6.4.jar;" net.minecraft.client.main.Main --username alan08 --session ${auth_session} --version 1.6.4 --gameDir F:\myLauncher\Launcher\.minecraft --assetsDir F:\myLauncher\Launcher\.minecraft\assets
可是。。。。。。。。
复制到命令行之后却说。。。。。。。。


到底是哪里错了啊，自己推断是-Djava.library.path="F:\myLauncher\Launcher\.minecraft\versions\natives"这句有问题，到底哪里错了啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊？？？？？？？？
PS:似乎图太扁了，点开来看故障情况

replies.author: officeyutong
replies.txt_content:
你这个我也不知道什么问题
但是这个代码能启动
java -Xmx2048M -Djava.library.path=J:\client\.minecraft
atives -cp J:\client\.minecraft\libraries
et\minecraftforge\minecraftforge\9.10.1.871\minecraftforge-9.10.1.871.jar;J:\client\.minecraft\libraries
et\minecraft\launchwrapper\1.3\launchwrapper-1.3.jar;J:\client\.minecraft\libraries\org\ow2\asm\asm-all\4.1\asm-all-4.1.jar;J:\client\.minecraft\libraries\org\scala-lang\scala-library\2.10.2\scala-library-2.10.2.jar;J:\client\.minecraft\libraries\org\scala-lang\scala-compiler\2.10.2\scala-compiler-2.10.2.jar;J:\client\.minecraft\libraries
et\sf\jopt-simple\jopt-simple\4.5\jopt-simple-4.5.jar;J:\client\.minecraft\libraries\lzma\lzma\0.0.1\lzma-0.0.1.jar;J:\client\.minecraft\libraries\com\paulscode\codecjorbis\20101023\codecjorbis-20101023.jar;J:\client\.minecraft\libraries\com\paulscode\codecwav\20101023\codecwav-20101023.jar;J:\client\.minecraft\libraries\com\paulscode\libraryjavasound\20101123\libraryjavasound-20101123.jar;J:\client\.minecraft\libraries\com\paulscode\librarylwjglopenal\20100824\librarylwjglopenal-20100824.jar;J:\client\.minecraft\libraries\com\paulscode\soundsystem\20120107\soundsystem-20120107.jar;J:\client\.minecraft\libraries\org\lwjgl\lwjgl\lwjgl\2.9.0\lwjgl-2.9.0.jar;J:\client\.minecraft\libraries\org\lwjgl\lwjgl\lwjgl_util\2.9.0\lwjgl_util-2.9.0.jar;J:\client\.minecraft\libraries\argo\argo\2.25_fixed\argo-2.25_fixed.jar;J:\client\.minecraft\libraries\org ouncycastle cprov-jdk15on\1.47 cprov-jdk15on-1.47.jar;J:\client\.minecraft\libraries\com\google\guava\guava\14.0\guava-14.0.jar;J:\client\.minecraft\libraries\org\apache\commons\commons-lang3\3.1\commons-lang3-3.1.jar;J:\client\.minecraft\libraries\commons-io\commons-io\2.4\commons-io-2.4.jar;J:\client\.minecraft\libraries
et\java\jinput\jinput\2.0.5\jinput-2.0.5.jar;J:\client\.minecraft\libraries
et\java\jutils\jutils\1.0.0\jutils-1.0.0.jar;J:\client\.minecraft\libraries\com\google\code\gson\gson\2.2.2\gson-2.2.2.jar;J:\client\.minecraft\libraries\org\lwjgl\lwjgl\lwjgl\2.9.0\lwjgl-2.9.0.jar;J:\client\.minecraft\libraries\org\lwjgl\lwjgl\lwjgl_util\2.9.0\lwjgl_util-2.9.0.jar;J:\client\.minecraft\librariesorg.lwjgl.lwjgl:\lwjgl:\2.9.1-nightly-20130708-debug3;J:\client\.minecraft\librariesorg.lwjgl.lwjgl:\lwjgl-platform:\2.9.1-nightly-20130708-debug;J:\client\.minecraft\versions\1.6.2-Forge9.10.1.871\1.6.2-Forge9.10.1.871.jar net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch --username Ted_Master --session auth_session --version 1.6.2-Forge9.10.1.871 --gameDir J:\client\.minecraft --assetsDir J:\client\.minecraft\assets --tweakClass cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker

replies.author: Alnd
replies.txt_content: 你用java来启动不如编个启动器再弄个快捷键

replies.author: huanghongxun
replies.txt_content: 都说了是-Djava.library.path=XXX 引号是打到整个而不是XXX那里

replies.author: alan08
replies.txt_content:
huanghongxun 发表于 2014-7-5 09:39
都说了是-Djava.library.path=XXX 引号是打到整个而不是XXX那里
额，是java -Xmx1024M "-Djava.library.path=F:\myLauncher\Launcher\.minecraft\versions\natives" 。。。。。。这样吗？木有用诶
